SELECT seat_code as seatCode, scs_code as scsCode, scr_code as scrCode, seat_row as seatRow, seat_col as seatCol, seat_useStatus as seatUseStatus FROM SEAT WHERE SEAT.scs_code=#{scsCode};

SELECT SCREEN_SCHEDULE.mov_code as movCode, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.brc_code as brcCode, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scr_code as scrCode, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_date as scsDate, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_startTime as scsStartTime, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_screen as scsScreen, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_timeDiscount as scsTimeDiscount, BRANCH.brc_name as brcName, MOVIE.mov_korName as movKorName, MOVIE.mov_grade as movGrade, MOVIE.mov_imgPath movImgPath, SCREEN.scr_rowSize as scrRowSize, SCREEN.scr_colSize as scrColSize
FROM SCREEN_SCHEDULE JOIN BRANCH ON BRANCH.brc_code = SCREEN_SCHEDULE.brc_code JOIN MOVIE ON MOVIE.mov_code = SCREEN_SCHEDULE.mov_code JOIN SCREEN ON SCREEN.scr_code = SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scr_code WHERE SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_code=#{scsCode};

SELECT SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_code as scsCode, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_startTime as scsStartTime, SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_timeDiscount as scsTimeDiscount FROM SCREEN_SCHEDULE WHERE SCREEN_SCHEDULE.mov_code = #{movCode} && SCREEN_SCHEDULE.brc_code = #{brcCode} && SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_date = #{Date};
SELECT DISTINCT SCREEN_SCHEDULE.scs_date FROM SCREEN_SCHEDULE WHERE scs_date>now() ORDER BY scs_date ASC
